name: Big Bad Bomb Bird
description:
Made in 72 hours for Weekly Game Jam 239, Mini Jame Gam #7, and Mini Jam 99

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Themes: Rollercoaster, You are the enemy, Birds

Limitation: Can't stop moving 

Special Object: A Pen

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You are a bird that is dropping bombs on people at a theme park, ruining their fun. Stay up in the sky and cause as much destruction as you can during this beautiful day out. But watch out! There might be a surprise fight waiting for you...
